page.title: 07ST.MARGARET'S C P SCHOOL.
page.content:
Our day starts at 8.55am when the whistle is blown for us to line up in the playground.After registration we all go into the hall for morning assembly.Mornings are usually language work and Mathematics.Mid morning break is at 10.30am and lunch is at 12.00am.
We have a very fine cook and all the dinners are cooked on the premises. After dinner we are looked after by Mrs Joyner,Mrs Wainwright and Mrs Dolbear-the dinner ladies. We play out on the playgrounds and when its fine on the playing fields which are at the side of the school.
My overall impression of my school is a good one. Here I think we are happy and well taught.
